definition[0]: a win-win situation, solution etc is one that will end well for everyone involved in it
example[0]: It’s a win-win situation all around.
definition[1]: used to describe a situation in which both sides involved gain something or are successful
example[1]: The extra earnings available to lenders and the facility provided for borrowers make it a win-win situation.
example[2]: A spokesman for the company called the contract a ‘win-win’ settlement.
